message.entry: Weighting scheme is only supported when the first argument is double or single arrays.
Weighting scheme must be specified after options.
When the weighting scheme is a vector, its length must equal the length of the specified operating dimension. Otherwise, it must be the same size as the first argument.
Weighting scheme must be a double or single array of real, nonnegative values.
No value given for the weighting scheme.
Weighting scheme is only supported when the dimension is a positive integer scalar.
Incorrect number of input arguments. Each parameter name must be followed by a corresponding value.
